entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 11:30 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: S 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
